title: Missions implied to have existed are not appearing?
body:
I don't even know if this is an issue or not, but the mission "A force of wills" says it will be completed after 7 missions, implying that there will be 7 missions.

But after I completed my third mission, new ones stopped showing up.

After completing the second one there was a "1" next to the scroll button stating that there was a new mission, but when i clicked on it there was no mission to be found.

Maybe there aren't supposed to be any more missions for today, but i want to make sure there isn't a bug or something blocking me from getting more missions.

replies.body: The mission "Force of Wills" does need 7 missions to be completed, and it should carry over your progress into the next day. For example, you completed 3 missions today so if you're able to complete 4 tomorrow then you'll finish it. Check out the [**VS Event site**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/events/vs-2017) for more of the 'fine print' details!

Thank you Broporo

Also, you have the best name.

Aw shucks, thanks! I do love mah poro bros ^_^. 

P.S. If you think **THIS** is a good name, you should see my other alias, Brocobo xD
